statements: SELECT trial_id, trial_name FROM clinical_trials;
SELECT sponsor_name, patient_count FROM clinical_trials ORDER BY patient_count DESC;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM clinical_trials WHERE ethical_approval = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials WHERE sponsor_name = 'ABC Pharmaceuticals';
SELECT trial_id, start_date, end_date, patient_count FROM clinical_trials WHERE patient_count > 100 AND ethical_approval = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials WHERE patient_count > 100;
SELECT trial_name, sponsor_name, start_date FROM clinical_trials WHERE end_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, patient_count FROM clinical_trials WHERE ethical_approval = TRUE ORDER BY patient_count DESC;
SELECT trial_name, sponsor_name, start_date, end_date FROM clinical_trials WHERE sponsor_name = 'ABC Pharmaceuticals' AND patient_count BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM clinical_trials WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials;
SELECT trial_name, lead_researcher FROM clinical_trials;
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM clinical_trials WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT participant_id, trial_id, participant_name, age, gender FROM trial_participants WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, lead_researcher FROM clinical_trials ORDER BY trial_name DESC;
SELECT trial_name, lead_researcher, start_date, end_date FROM clinical_trials;
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, lead_researcher FROM clinical_trials ORDER BY trial_name ASC;
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, lead_researcher FROM clinical_trials WHERE start_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT participant_name, age, gender FROM trial_participants WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT trial_name, COUNT(participant_id) AS total_participants FROM clinical_trials LEFT JOIN trial_participants ON clinical_trials.trial_id = trial_participants.trial_id GROUP BY trial_name;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, name, location FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT treatment_id, medication, start_date, end_date FROM treatments WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM trials WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, age, location FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM treatments WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT trial_name, trial_description FROM trials WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT name, medication, start_date FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id WHERE patients.gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials;
SELECT trial_name, start_date FROM clinical_trials ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM trial_patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT site_name, location FROM trial_sites WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT trial_id, COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM trial_results GROUP BY trial_id;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM clinical_trials WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT t.trial_name, p.patient_name, r.result FROM clinical_trials t JOIN trial_results r ON t.trial_id = r.trial_id JOIN trial_patients p ON r.patient_id = p.patient_id WHERE p.patient_age > 30;
SELECT t.trial_name, s.site_name, s.location FROM clinical_trials t JOIN trial_sites s ON t.trial_id = s.site_id;

SELECT p.patient_name, t.trial_name, r.result FROM trial_patients p JOIN trial_results r ON p.patient_id = r.patient_id JOIN clinical_trials t ON r.trial_id = t.trial_id WHERE r.result LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT * FROM trials;
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM trials ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT subject_name, age, gender FROM subjects WHERE age > 30;
SELECT treatment_name, description FROM treatments WHERE treatment_id = 1;
SELECT subject_id, trial_id, measurement_date, value FROM measurements WHERE value > 50 ORDER BY measurement_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM trials;
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, organization FROM trials ORDER BY organization DESC;
SELECT subject_id, subject_name, age, gender FROM subjects WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT treatment_name, description FROM treatments WHERE treatment_name LIKE 'P%';

SELECT m.measurement_id, s.subject_name, t.trial_name, m.measurement_date, m.value FROM measurements m JOIN subjects s ON m.subject_id = s.subject_id JOIN trials t ON m.trial_id = t.trial_id ORDER BY m.value DESC, m.measurement_date ASC;
